authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create or Update
options.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

tableName.name: tableName
tableName.description: Table to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableName.ai_hint: Table to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

dataToSend.name: dataToSend

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Define Below for Each Column
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.ai_hint: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: eanUi
options.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. View details.

options.name: readType
options.description: Type of read to perform on the table. View details.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnValues.name: returnValues

options.name: Attribute Values
options.description: The content of the old item is returned

returnValues.description: Use ReturnValues if you want to get the item attributes as they appeared before they were deleted
returnValues.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

keysUi.name: keysUi
keysUi.description: Item's primary key. For example, with a simple primary key, you only need to provide a value for the partition key. For a composite primary key, you must provide values for both the partition key and the sort key.
keysUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

select.name: select

options.name: Specific Attributes
options.description: Select them in Attributes to Select under Additional Fields

select.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

scan.name: scan
scan.description: Whether to do an scan or query. Check differences.

filterExpression.name: filterExpression
filterExpression.description: A filter expression determines which items within the Scan results should be returned to you. All of the other results are discarded. Empty value will return all Scan results.
filterExpression.ai_hint: A filter expression determines which items within the Scan results should be returned to you. All of the other results are discarded. Empty value will return all Scan results.

keyConditionExpression.name: keyConditionExpression
keyConditionExpression.description: Condition to determine the items to be retrieved. The condition must perform an equality test on a single partition key value, in this format: partitionKeyName = :partitionkeyval
keyConditionExpression.ai_hint: Condition to determine the items to be retrieved. The condition must perform an equality test on a single partition key value, in this format: partitionKeyName = :partitionkeyval

eavUi.name: eavUi
eavUi.description: Substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression
eavUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
indexName
options.description: Name of the index to query. It can be any secondary local or global index on the table.

options.name: projectionExpression
options.description: Text that identifies one or more attributes to retrieve from the table. These attributes can include scalars, sets, or elements of a JSON document. The attributes in the expression must be separated by commas.

options.name: filterExpression
options.description: Text that contains conditions that DynamoDB applies after the Query operation, but before the data is returned. Items that do not satisfy the FilterExpression criteria are not returned.

options.name: eanUi
options.description: One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. Check Info.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'item' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'item' THEN SHOW parameter 'tableName'
IF operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'dataToSend'
IF operation == 'upsert' AND dataToSend == 'autoMapInputData' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputsToIgnore'
IF operation == 'upsert' AND dataToSend == 'defineBelow' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsUi'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnValues'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'keysUi'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'delete' AND returnValues == 'ALL_OLD' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'select'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'get' AND select IN ["ALL_PROJECTED_ATTRIBUTES", "ALL_ATTRIBUTES"] THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'keysUi'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'scan'
IF scan == True THEN SHOW parameter 'filterExpression'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' AND scan == False THEN SHOW parameter 'keyConditionExpression'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'eavUi'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'select'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' AND select IN ["ALL_PROJECTED_ATTRIBUTES", "ALL_ATTRIBUTES", "SPECIFIC_ATTRIBUTES"] THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF /scan == False THEN SHOW parameter 'filterExpression'
